alert.note: Alert for Central and East Adams and Arapahoe Counties; Logan County; Morgan County; North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County; Phillips County; Sedgwick County; Washington County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Heat Advisory issued August 22 at 11:45AM MDT until August 22 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...High temperatures will range from 96 to 102. * WHERE...Denver, Fort Morgan, Byers, Sterling, Akron, Julesburg, and Holyoke. * WHEN...Until 8 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Hot temperatures may cause heat illnesses.
info.instruction: Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors. To reduce risk during outdoor work, the Occupational Safety and Health Administration recommends scheduling frequent rest breaks in shaded or air conditioned environments. Anyone overcome by heat should be moved to a cool and shaded location. Heat stroke is an emergency! Call 9 1 1.
